abstract: Amgen says that it has set aside $780 million to settle various federal and state investigations of whistle-blower lawsuits accusing it of illegal sales and marketing tactics.
snippet: Lawsuits accused the drug company of illegal sales and marketing tactics.
lead_paragraph: Lawsuits accused the drug company of illegal sales and marketing tactics.

headline.main: Amgen to Pay $780 Million to Settle Suits on Its Sales
headline.print_headline: Amgen to Pay $780 Million To Settle Suits On Its Sales
headline.seo: Amgen to Pay $780 Million to Settle Marketing Accusations
